creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta G. Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three selvage panel with attached sleeves; red ground with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning in orange, green, white, purple and magenta in a herring-bone pattern; brocaded buttoned placquet
object_name: Jacket from a Complete Man's Costume
title: Jacket from a Complete Man's Costume
